concept.title: SQLite 3 Overview
concept.shortdesc: The SQLite 3 component provides an implementation of the native SQLite C APIs.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: SQLite 3 provides an interface that makes it possible for developers to include their own SQLite implementations in a Symbian application.

section.title: Required background
section.p: You should have a good understanding of SQLite 3 and be familiar with the Symbian implementation, Symbian SQL.

li.p: if you are porting an existing SQLite application written in C
